author: Special Correspondent
text: Southern Railway will be operating a special train (No. 06181) from Chennai Egmore to Tirunelveli via Chidambaram, Thanjavur, Tiruchi and Madurai on January 25 to clear the extra rush of passengers. It will leave Chennai Egmore at 10.45 p.m. In the return direction, the train (No. 00642) will leave Tirunelveli at 6.20 p.m. on January 26. Reservations are open.
title: Additional train to Nellai
